snippet: The technology media company GigaOM acquired the parent company of one of its competitors, paidContent, for an undisclosed sum.
abstract: The technology media company GigaOM acquired the parent company of one of its competitors, paidContent, for an undisclosed sum.
lead_paragraph: The technology media company GigaOM acquired the parent company of one of its competitors, paidContent, for an undisclosed sum from Guardian News & Media Limited. With the acquisition, GigaOM will add 15 additional employees to its staff of 40, and expand its footprint in the New York and European markets. The move is the latest example of consolidation in the field, DealBook reported, including AOL's purchase of TechCrunch in the fall for tens of millions of dollars. Read more on DealBook »
